verses.text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives.
And early in the morning he came again into the temple, and all the people came unto him; and he sat down, and taught them.
And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery; and when they had set her in the midst,
They say unto him, Master, this woman was taken in adultery, in the very act.
Now Moses in the law commanded us, that such should be stoned: but what sayest thou?

This they said, tempting him, that they might have to accuse him. But Jesus stooped down, and with hisfinger wrote on the ground, \+w as though|strong="G4364"\+w* he heard them \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*.

So when they continued asking him, he lifted up himself, and said unto them, \+w He that is without sin|strong="G0361"\+w* \+w among you|strong="G5216"\+w*, \+w let him|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w cast|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w a stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w*.
And again he stooped down, and wrote on the ground.
And they which heard it, being convicted by their ownconscience, went out one by one, beginning at the eldest, evenunto the last: and Jesus was left alone, and the woman standing in the midst.

When Jesus had lifted up himself, and saw none but the woman, he said unto her, \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w where|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w accusers|strong="G2725"\+w*? \+w hath|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w condemned|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*?

She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, \+w Neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w do|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w condemn|strong="G2632"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*: \+w go|strong="G4198"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0264"\+w* \+w no more|strong="G3371"\+w*.

¶ Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of the world|strong="G2889"\+w*: \+w he that followeth|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1698"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w darkness|strong="G4653"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w shall have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of life|strong="G2222"\+w*.
The Pharisees therefore said unto him, Thou bearest record of thyself; thy record is not true.

Jesus answered and said unto them, \+w Though|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w bear record|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+add yet\+add* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w record|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w I came|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whither|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G5217"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whither|strong="G4226"\+w* \+w I go|strong="G5217"\+w*.

\+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w after|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w the flesh|strong="G4561"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3762"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w*, \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2920"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.

\+w It is|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w also|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5212"\+w* \+w law|strong="G3551"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the testimony|strong="G3141"\+w* \+w of two|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*.

\+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w one that bear witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w beareth witness|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*.

Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, \+w Ye|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*: \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye had known|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w ye should have known|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*.
These words spake Jesus in the treasury, as he taught in the temple: and no man laid hands on him; for his hour was not yet come.

Then said Jesus again unto them, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w go my way|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*: \+w whither|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*.
Then said the Jews, Will he kill himself? because he saith, Whither I go, ye cannot come.

And he said unto them, \+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w beneath|strong="G2736"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w above|strong="G0507"\+w*: \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*; \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*.

\+w I said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye shall die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*, \+w ye shall die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*.

Then said they unto him, Who art thou? And Jesus saith unto them, \+w Even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add the same\+add* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I said|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w from the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w*.

\+w I have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w many things|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w to say|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w he that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*; \+w and I|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w speak|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w those things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I have heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w of|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.
They understood not that he spake to them of the Father.

Then said Jesus unto them, \+w When|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w ye have lifted up|strong="G5312"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w shall ye know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+add he\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add that\+add* I \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w nothing|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath taught|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w I speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w*: \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w left|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G3441"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w always|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w those things that please|strong="G0701"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.
As he spake these words, many believed on him.

Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w continue|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w word|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+add then\+add* \+w are ye|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w disciples|strong="G3101"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G0230"\+w*;

\+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w* \+w shall make|strong="G1659"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1659"\+w*.
¶ They answered him, We be Abraham’s seed, and were never in bondage to any man: how sayest thou, Ye shall be made free?

Jesus answered them, \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w committeth|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w of sin|strong="G0266"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w abideth|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3614"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G0165"\+w*: \+add but\+add* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w abideth|strong="G3306"\+w* \+w ever|strong="G0165"\+w*.

\+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w shall make|strong="G1659"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1659"\+w*, \+w ye shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w free|strong="G1658"\+w* \+w indeed|strong="G3689"\+w*.

\+w I know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w Abraham’s|strong="G0011"\+w* \+w seed|strong="G4690"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w ye seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w to kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w word|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G5562"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w place|strong="G5562"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*.

\+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I have seen|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye have seen|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w*.

They answered and said unto him, Abraham is our father. Jesus saith unto them, \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* ye \+w were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w Abraham’s|strong="G0011"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w ye would do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w of Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*.

\+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w ye seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w to kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w hath told|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w I have heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w of|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*: \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*.

\+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the deeds|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w of your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w*.Then said they to him, We be not born of fornication; we have one Father, evenGod.

Jesus said unto them, \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w ye would love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w proceeded forth|strong="G1831"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w came|strong="G2240"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*; \+w neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w came I|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w he|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.

\+w Why|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w do ye|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w understand|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w speech|strong="G2981"\+w*? \+add even\+add* \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w word|strong="G3056"\+w*.

\+w Ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+add your\+add* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w the devil|strong="G1228"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the lusts|strong="G1939"\+w* of \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w ye will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w*. \+w He|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w a murderer|strong="G0443"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the beginning|strong="G0746"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w abode|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w there is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w truth|strong="G0225"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*. \+w When|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w he speaketh|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w a lie|strong="G5579"\+w*, he \+w speaketh|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w his own|strong="G2398"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w a liar|strong="G5583"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w of it|strong="G0846"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+add you\+add* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w ye believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*.

\+w Which|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w convinceth|strong="G1651"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w*? \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w the truth|strong="G0225"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*?

\+w He that is|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w heareth|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w God’s|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w words|strong="G4487"\+w*: \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+add them\+add* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w ye are|strong="G2075"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.
Then answered the Jews, and said unto him, Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil?

Jesus answered, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w a devil|strong="G1140"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w I honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w do dishonour|strong="G0818"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.

\+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w mine own|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w glory|strong="G1391"\+w*: \+w there is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w one that seeketh|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w judgeth|strong="G2919"\+w*.

\+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w verily|strong="G0281"\+w*, \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w keep|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w saying|strong="G3056"\+w*, \+w he shall|strong="G2334"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w see|strong="G2334"\+w* \+w death|strong="G2288"\+w*.
Then said the Jews unto him, Now we know that thou hast a devil. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest, If a man keep my saying, he shall never taste of death.
